name: impload
short_description: A lightweight image downloader that works the way I want it to without fuss. Files are created in a folder tree of the form "<base>/<YYYY>/<YYYY-MM-DD/" and are named "[<camera>_]YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS_<NNNNNN>.<ext>". If you want a different naming convention, you can DIY.
